children.value: Transforming SCSS into CSS is a matter of using less than 5 lines of code. NPM has a package that you can use with Gulp. In less than 5 minutes, you can have SCSS configured to compile all your files into CSS.

The first step is to get the gulp sass package. You need to install the dependency has development since you won't need it at the browser level. ``` 
 npm install gulp-sass --save-dev
You can find all changes for SCSS inside

for the project we are building up. You may see some differences in the commit compared to this blog post. For example, instead of relying on string directly inside the task for path, I opted to use a constant. It's always better to have in a centralized way in case of change or in case that it can be reused in another task.
Another change that you might consider is to add this new created task in the dependency of tasks for the build task or the watcher.
